scripts.dev:bg: rm -f server.log server.pid && (node src/index.js > server.log 2>&1 & echo $! > server.pid) && echo Started backend in background PID $(cat server.pid)
scripts.stop:bg: if [ -f server.pid ]; then kill $(cat server.pid) 2>/dev/null || true; rm -f server.pid; echo Stopped backend background process; else echo No server.pid found; fi
